special_text:
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Manuela becomes a 5/5 Avatar enchantment creature with indestructible until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
[+1]: Put your choice of a +1/+1 counter or a menace counter on up to one target creature.
[-2]: Exile target nonland permanent. Its owner may cast it without paying its mana cost on a later turn as long as it remains exiled.
[-5]: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
